summary: This is an email chain from July 2, 2019, regarding unit updates being due. The first email is a reminder that updates are needed, and the second email apologizes for a delay and attaches an update document.

events.title: Unit Update Reminder and Submission
events.description: An email reminder is sent that unit updates are due, requiring submission that morning. A follow-up email apologizes for a delay and attaches an update document.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email chain dated July 2, 2019, concerning administrative unit updates.
The email sender and recipients are redacted, indicated by placeholders like (USANYS).
An attachment named 'PC_Unitr _Short_Form_Update.7.2.19.docx' is referenced, suggesting a periodic status report.
The communication highlights routine administrative follow-up within an organization, with no direct mention of case-specific individuals, events, or allegations.
